title: TERRAFORMING has begun:
cleaned_text: "Global dimming" it’s a dangerous geoengineering plot to spray billions of tons of smog into the atmosphere so that pollution levels would block sunlight and halt global warming. This is literally what the mad environmental scientists are now proposing -- the very same people who have, for years, claimed that "chemtrails" are a conspiracy theory and don’t exist.
